amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the EPA to continue to have the authority to set standards for NPDES Permit programs by striking section 2.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-144 to allow the EPA to continue to have the authority to set standards for NPDES Permit programs by striking section 2.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 252 (Roll no. 565).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
